utterance.content: Saving us both from contraband charges. It was great knowing you. I need to be taken into protective custody.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Wow. That was great. I think I really dodged a bullet there.

utterance.speaker: Guard
utterance.content: You don't need P.C.?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Uh, it's nothing personal. We'll reschedule. Rain check, I promise.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: It wasn't the food. It was the heat. It's mastocytosis. It can be set off by hot liquids, like the coffee he just drank.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: Masto's usually a skin disease.

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: Usually? It can hit any organ. Joint pain, osteopenia, and anaphylaxis,eyebrow loss… It fits.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: It's a possibility. I'll run some blood tests. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: No, no! It's almost impossible to confirm masto with blood work. Just give him five aspirin.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: If he has masto, he'll go into anaphylactic shock and won't be able to breathe again.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You do understand the meaning of the word "confirm."

utterance.speaker: Nick
utterance.content: I'll do it. I almost died in that cell.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: House, you're in here because you think you can do whatever you want whenever you want. You can't, and neither can I. The A.C.L.U. would have my job, my license, maybe even my house, if I do an unauthorized experiment—

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: But if-if it is masto—

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: It's not.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Well, what do you have to lose by giving him the aspirin?

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: I'm not taking the risk.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: It's his risk to take. If he has another attack and there isn't a doctor in the next cell, he could die! So for one second, will you stop covering your ass and do the test?

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: I think House is right.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You're a moron and a coward. I'll do it myself.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: Guard. You're done here, just like every other place you've ever set foot in your life. If I ever see you in here again, I will write you up, and they will revoke your parole.

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: Dr. House. Did you get all the Vicodin you needed? I'm not an idiot. That fire, the bruise on your face… I talk to prisoners. I know about exit taxes. You're clearly getting squeezed.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: I need 20. And let me back into the clinic when Sykes is gone.

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: We'll take care of Nick.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You can't if you're not willing to do—

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: Just take care of yourself.

utterance.speaker: Mendelson
utterance.content: Well done. If knew if you'd learned nothing else in here, you'd learned the smart thing is to fall in line.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: You're absolutely right.

utterance.speaker: Alvarez
utterance.content: Hey, hey, hey! I need backup here. Hey! Hey!

utterance.speaker: Mendelson
utterance.content: Son of a bitch.

utterance.speaker: Alvarez
utterance.content: You'd better be fast…

utterance.speaker: Mendelson
utterance.content: Come on. Come on!

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Thanks for getting me to the clinic.

utterance.speaker: Mendelson
utterance.content: Take him out.

utterance.speaker: Sullivan
utterance.content: I've got only two years left in my stretch.

utterance.speaker: Mendelson
utterance.content: Take him out.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: C.O.! We have a little problem here!

utterance.speaker: Alvarez
utterance.content: I need backup, I need backup! We got a big fight here.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Alvarez!

utterance.speaker: Alvarez
utterance.content: Sullivan, back off! Mendelson! You're gonna be held responsible.

utterance.speaker: Mendelson
utterance.content: Heyyyyyy… I'm just playing solitaire.

utterance.speaker: Guard
utterance.content: Hands behind your head!

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: You are so lucky. We got a guy in an ambulance heading to Princeton General. Another dozen getting teargas hosed off them.

utterance.speaker: Officer
utterance.content: Hey! Sit down! Back off.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Where's the aspirin?

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: Oh, God. Did you get beaten up on purpose?

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: House, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Officer
utterance.content: House, open up! This is a direct order!

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Yeah, it's always a direct order. Eight months. Haven't heard an indirect order in here.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: Dr. Adams!

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: They're gonna revoke your parole. They're gonna charge you with extra crimes. You'll be here six more months, minimum!

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Sorry. Distracted. You were saying?

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: I checked your file. You didn't have a bad lawyer. You had no lawyer. You took the first deal they offered you, because you wanted to punish yourself. Do you think getting beaten up, you think saving this one guy will wipe your slate clean?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: Then why are you doing this?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: 'Cause I have a gift. Once you drink this, you should get an attack almost immediately. That is, if I'm right.

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: You just bought yourself months in solitary. Was it really worth it?

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: If I'm wrong, no, it wasn't.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: No! No! No! Get the cup! Get the cup!

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Just drink it! Drink it!

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: No! Grab the cup!

utterance.speaker: Officer
utterance.content: Hands behind your back.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: What were you thinking?

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: I don't know. I-I-I was-I was scared.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: No! You're fired. You're beyond fired. You're completely unhireable anywhere. You understand that?

utterance.speaker: Adams
utterance.content: Yes. Now shut up and let's see if he has an attack.

utterance.speaker: House
utterance.content: Come on, just a little more time.

utterance.speaker: Sykes
utterance.content: Get him out of here.
